title: When will I get my free gift from riot?
body: Everyone I know has got theirs and I haven't got mine. I haven't had any chat restrictions for anything that riot said would make so I wouldn't get one. Is there a way to check?

replies.body: what were requirements to get free gift?
if u didnt get a ranked or chat restriction, 14-day ban, or perm ban in 2014, u'll get one apparently they're sending them in waves.
Also being level 5+ and having 10+ skins available to be gifted

I'm in the same situation. Haven't had any bans or chat restrictions, no skin yet. I think they're rolling them out over time; probably your friends just were lucky to get them first. Be patient for now. :)
